text: The canton of Arles is an administrative division of the Bouches-du-Rhône department, in southeastern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Arles.Décret n° 2014-271 du 27 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département des Bouches-du-Rhône ==Composition== It consists of the following communes: #Arles #Port-Saint-Louis-du-Rhône #Saintes-Maries-de-la- Mer ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Councillors!!Party!!Occupation |- |style="background- color: "| | 2015 | Nicolas Koukas | PCF | Councillor of Arles |- |style="background-color: " | | 2015 | Aurore Raoux | PCF | Former Councillor of Port-Saint-Louis-du-Rhône |} ==Pictures of the canton== {| |The Chateau d'Avignon in Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer |View of Arles |} ==See also== * Canton of Saintes-Maries-de-la-Mer ==References== Category:Cantons of Bouches-du- Rhône
title: Canton of Arles
